snippet: Federal authorities arrested an Uzbek man in Boise on charges that he assisted a foreign terrorist group and possessed bomb-making materials.
abstract: Federal authorities in Boise, Idaho, arrest Uzbek man Fazliddin Kurbanov on charges that he provided foreign terrorist group with help in building explosive device.
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities arrested an Uzbek man in Boise on charges that he assisted a foreign terrorist group and possessed bomb-making materials.

headline.seo: Uzbek Man in Boise Is Charged in Bomb Plot
headline.main: Uzbek Man in Idaho Is Held in Bomb Plot
headline.print_headline: Uzbek Man Held in Bomb Plot
